author: bayard
msg: junit.home, commons-logging.home and commons-collections.home are only used to define the directories of the jar files; which are then defined as separate variables. Seems pointless, so removing them. Also removing the junit.jar declaration from build.xml, seems pointless given that it's in build.properties.sample.
